title: Data Shield docs
introduction: With IBM Cloud Data Shield, you can protect the data in your containerized workloads while your data is in use.

section_recommended.title: Getting started
section_recommended.description: Install Data Shield on your cluster to start securing your data.

section_recommended.title: Deploying apps with the Enclave Manager
section_recommended.description: Convert and deploy your applications by using the Enclave Manager UI.

section_recommended.title: Curated apps
section_recommended.description: Use a Data Shield ready application to get familiar with the service.

section_videos.title: IBM Cloud Data Shield - Secure Data Runtime / In Use

tiles.title: Version 1.27.1226
tiles.description: Upgrades and issue fixes for the Enclave Manager and EnclaveOS.

tiles.title: Version 1.26.1148
tiles.description: Added support to prevent the creation of duplicate builds and other updates.

tiles.title: Version 1.25.1090
tiles.description: Added support for Kubernetes Service clusters v1.18 and fixed vulnerabilities.
